to use this patch on wii copy the files onto the root of your sd card then open riivolution and enable the "Enable TBRB Ultimate" patch and launch the game

to use this patch on dolphin extract the zip then right click on tbrb and click "start with riivolution patches..."
then click on "open riivolution xml" and find where you extracted the zip and select the one in the riivolution folder
it should auto set the "sd root" to where you extracted the zip if not set the "sd root" to there
once done press "start" and it should work
